error/exifAnalyzer/differentCameras: Unable to process, because files have different cameras in Exif profiles.
error/exifAnalyzer/differentDates: Unable to process, because files have different timestamps in Exif profiles.
error/exifAnalyzer/exifException: Unable to process, because of Exif reading failure.
error/tokenize/datetime: Unable to tokenize file bunch — date/time detection error.
error/unableToAssembleTokens: Unable to assemble tokens into new filename.
error/unableToCopy: Unable to copy file from ''{0}'' to ''{1}''.
error/unableToMove: Unable to move file from ''{0}'' to ''{1}''.
parameters/description/P_AUTHOR: Set author token to this value. If not specified, then author token is not changed. If empty, then author token is removed.
parameters/description/P_CAMERAS: Process files from specified cameras (space/comma separated list; repeatable). Use empty value to process all files.
parameters/description/P_COPY: Copy files instead of moving them. This option is ignored, if source and destination paths (including subdirs) of file are equal.
parameters/description/P_FROM: Download files from this path. Can be used multiple times. All positioned parameters also parsed like this option. Usage dash/minus '-' to read paths (line by line) from STDIN or list file. All specifically passed files are processed as single files, not as bunch.
parameters/description/P_LIMIT: Limit amount of processed files by value.
parameters/description/P_LIST_FILE: Read paths (line by line) from this file is case of dash/minus passed as FROM path. If this parameter is not specified, paths are read from STDIN.
parameters/description/P_LOG_LEVEL: Log level for log file (from 100 to 600; see Monolog logger documentation).
parameters/description/P_NO_COMPARE_EXIF: Do not compare Exifs for files in bunch.
parameters/description/P_NO_DELETE_DUPLI: Do not delete found duplicates (MD5 sums are compared).
parameters/description/P_NO_SUBDIRS: Do not create directory structure in to-path.
parameters/description/P_PANORAMIC_RATIO: Aspect ratio, after which files are considered panoramic.
parameters/description/P_PREFER_EXIF_DT: Prefer date/time from Exif, even if they are set in filename.
parameters/description/P_REGEXP_FILTER: Filter files by regular expression. The check is performed on result filename (including directory and extension). Files in bunches are processed separately.
parameters/description/P_REGEXP_NEGATIVE: Filter files by regular expression. Negative filter option (files matched by expression will not be parsed). The check is performed on result filename (including directory and extension). Files in bunches are processed separately.
parameters/description/P_SAVE_COMMANDS_F: Save executed commands to this file.
parameters/description/P_SIMULATE: Simulate. Will output commands to STDOUT.
parameters/description/P_SUBDIRS_FORMAT: Format of subdirectories structure (see strftime() function manual on http://php.net/strftime ).
parameters/description/P_TIMEZONE: Timezone of exif tags without it (by default local TZ is used). Usually tags have no TZ (except GPSDateTime). Usable with 'Trust Exif DT' option. Format: ±00:00 or ±0000.
parameters/description/P_TO: Upload files to this path. Use dash '-' to keep files in place and only rename.
parameters/description/P_TOKENS_ADD: Add these tokens to new filenames (space/comma separated list; repeatable).
parameters/description/P_TOKENS_DROP: Drop these tokens from new filenames (space/comma separated list; repeatable).
parameters/description/P_VERBOSE_LEVEL: Log level for output (from 100 to 600; see Monolog logger documentation).
processedFilesLimitWasReached: Processed files limit was reached ({0, plural, one {# file} other {# files}} limit).
skipped/targetAlreadyExists: --> skipped .{0} file (already exists at destination path)
xFilesProcessed: {0, plural, one {# file} other {# files}} processed.
